root.name: Endgame
root.description: OverviewEndgame is a light gun shooter developed by Cunning Developments and published by Empire Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 2 platform.PlotEuroDream has developed a virtual reality which is to be updated, however Tyler has knowledge of something nefarious with the update and is then kidnapped. The player plays as Jade Cornell who is tasked with rescuing Tyler from EuroDream Technologies.GameplayEndgame plays very similarly to the Time Crisis series of games. The gameplay moves "on rails" and the player uses the light gun to shoot at the enemies that appear on screen.The player can use the button (either press and hold or release depending on the settings used) on the GunCon to duck behind obstacles, which will also reload the gun.
